name: City Sprouts Preschool
description: Program offers full day, partial or full week schedules for children in a large developmentally appropriate indoor and outdoor space. City Sprouts Preschool provides organic homemade snacks and lunches for the children. City Sprouts Preschool accepts children into the preschool program starting at 2 1/2 years old (or upon readiness). The toddler program accepts children starting at 18 months old. Children may attend two, three or five full days a week. They do not expect children to be potty tra
